episode.title: United Transportation Union v. Long Island Rail Road Company

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgments and opinion of the Court to announce in United Transportation Union against the Long Island Railroad Company, and for reasons stated in the opinion for the courts filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit is reversed and the case is remanded to that Court for proceedings consistent with our opinion.
